com.simas.vc

Class DelayedHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simas.vc.DelayedHandler

  • public class DelayedHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Message Handler class that queues messages until resume is called.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • DelayedHandler

        public DelayedHandler(android.os.Handler handler)
        Create a resumable handler. Default state: Paused.

        public final void resume()
        Resume the handler.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Adds the Runnable to the queue. It will be run immediately if the handler is resumed.
